meeting_request.purpose: Feeling overwhelmed by my philosophy course and uncertain about my future path
meeting_request.description: Hi, I’m Brian, a first-year Philosophy major. I’ve taken a few classes so far and really enjoyed some of the readings, but lately I’m feeling a lot more anxious than I used to. I’m worried that I’m not doing well enough to pass the course, and I’m also starting to wonder if I should be majoring in something else entirely. I’ve always been interested in the humanities, but I don’t know if I should be trying to pursue a serious academic field like philosophy at this early stage. I’d love to talk to someone about how to manage my workload and feel more confident in what I’m doing, and I think this is a good opportunity to get some support.
